content: crochet a kawaii frog wall hanging with this quick and easy pattern perfect spring/summer decor pattern includes a chart and written instructions some knowledge of intarsia crochet required the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog **materials ** * worsted weight yarn * dk weight yarn * 5mm crochet hook * 2 5mm crochet hook * 15mm safety eyes * 4 ply yarn in black or black embroidery floss * 8mm dowel rod * twine/yarn for hanging * yarn needle stitch marker scissors * optional fabric glue the finished item measure approximately 6 25 x 7 16cm x 18cm not including the fringe item size may vary depending on the materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/frog-wall-hanging-crochet-pattern/
